<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 6"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Mesmerizing Gaze](/Feats.aspx?ID=6300) <actions string="Two Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=535" />
<trait label="Concentrate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=561" />
<trait label="Emotion" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=590" />
<trait label="Mental" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=647" />
<trait label="Visual" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=727" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 194 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Archetype** [Celebrity](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=245)

**Prerequisites**
[Celebrity Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=6298)

</column>

---

When you meet someone's gaze, they're unable to look away from you. Choose one target creature you can see and that can see you. That creature must succeed at a Will save or be [fascinated](/Conditions.aspx?ID=72) with you until the end of your next turn; the DC is the higher of your class DC or spell DC. If the creature succeeds at its save or its fascination ends due to a hostile action, it becomes temporarily immune to your Mesmerizing Gaze for 1 day.
name: Mesmerizing Gaze
